Advanced Domain Control with GitHub Pages

published 16 Jan 2014 in devops

I recently discussed ways of migrating your site without killing your SEO precense and, as an example, noted some of the steps I took in migrating my site to GitHub Pages. Let's take a deeper look in getting more control over your domain when hosting your site with GitHub.

Pro's and Con's of GitHub Pages

Pro's Con's
Fast No SSL
Simple Deployment No 301's
DDOS Protection
